niagara.logical
Class WindowGroup

java.lang.Object
  niagara.optimizer.colombia.Op
      niagara.optimizer.colombia.LogicalOp
          niagara.logical.LogicalOperator
              niagara.logical.UnaryOperator
                  niagara.logical.Group
                      niagara.logical.WindowGroup
All Implemented Interfaces:
SerializableToXML
Direct Known Subclasses:
WindowAggregate
public abstract class WindowGroup
extends Group

This is the class for the logical group operator. This is an abstract class from which various notions of grouping can be derived. The core part of this class is the skolem function attributes that are used for grouping and are common to all the sub-classes

loadGroupingAttrsFromXML

protected void loadGroupingAttrsFromXML(org.w3c.dom.Element e,
                                        LogicalProperty inputLogProp,
                                        java.lang.String gpAttrName)
                                 throws InvalidPlanException
create the groupingAttrs object by loading the grouping attributes from an xml element. the grouping attributes are specified in an attribute of element e.

Overrides:

Parameters:

inputLogProp - logical properties of the input??
gpAttrName - The attribute of element e which contains the grouping attributes.
